title: Jalandhri meets Qureshi; lauds Pakistan’s efforts on Palestine issue
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 3 (APP): Secretary General of Wafaqul Madaris Qari Hanif Jalandhri Thursday called on Foreign Minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi and appreciated the way Government of Pakistan made efforts to raise voice against Israeli aggression in Palestine.
The meeting discussed the Muslim unity, interfaith harmony and other matters of mutual interests.
Hanif Jalandhri said the Israeli aggression against defenseless Palestinian people had disturbed the Muslims across the world.
He said the way Pakistan, in cooperation with Turkey and other Muslim countries, raised the voice on Palestine issue at the United Nations General Assembly was laudable.
Foreign Minister Qureshi said soon after the Israeli attack on Al-Aqsa Mosque, the Government of Pakistan, under Prime Minister Imran Khan’s leadership decided to formulate a joint strategy at the OIC platform and highlight the issue forcefully.
He said the Saudi leadership’s decision to summon emergency meeting of OIC’s Executive Committee was commendable. In form of ceasefire in Palestine, Pakistan achieved success in its primary objective, he added.
The foreign minister said on behalf of OIC, Pakistan presented a resolution at UN Human Rights Council on Palestine issue demanding which was adopted. The resolution had called for formation of an inquiry commission for fair probe into human rights abuses in Palestine.
